abstract: The Swedish-born photographer Per-Anders Pettersson has spent the last five years documenting the vibrant fashion scene across sub-Saharan African. For his new book, “African Catwalk,” he photographed more than 40 shows, giving viewers an insider’s perspective on a spectacle that often goes unseen.
